quote: Duty is a good thing, a calling without which no civilization can survive, but it is also a weight and chain that sometimes seems sure to sink you to the airless bottom of a dark pool
quote_letters: DUTY IS A GOOD THING A CALLING WITHOUT WHICH NO CIVILIZATION CAN SURVIVE BUT IT IS ALSO A WEIGHT AND CHAIN THAT SOMETIMES SEEMS SURE TO SINK YOU TO THE AIRLESS BOTTOM OF A DARK POOL
